directions: Unroll each package of dough into 2 rectangles. Press onto bottom and up sides of 15x10x1-inch pan, firmly pressing seams and perforations together to seal.
Bake 11 to 13 min. or until golden brown; cool.
Mix reduced-fat cream cheese, dressing and seasonings until well blended; spread onto crust. Top with remaining ingredients. Refrigerate 2 hours.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans refrigerated reduced-fat crescent dinner rolls
1 (8 ounce) container PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese
title: Spring Veggie Pizza Appetizer
